citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b)
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10am on
05/26/2015.
